statements: UPDATE PlasticPollutionData SET PollutionLevel = 3.5, DateRecorded = '2022-07-15' WHERE RecordID = 1;
UPDATE PlasticPollutionData SET LocationID = 10, AnalysisType = 'Microbial Analysis' WHERE RecordID = 3;
UPDATE PlasticPollutionData SET PollutionLevel = 0.75, DateRecorded = '2021-10-15' WHERE RecordID = 1;
UPDATE PlasticPollutionData SET LocationID = 7, AnalysisType = 'Water Samples' WHERE RecordID = 3;
UPDATE plastic_pollution_data SET pollution_level = 5 WHERE country = 'USA';
UPDATE policy_making SET enacted_year = 2022, legislation = 'Plastic Ban' WHERE country = 'UK';
UPDATE plastic_pollution_data SET pollution_level = 5, year = 2022 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE policy_making SET impact = 'Positive Impact', enacted_year = 2021, legislation = 'Ban on Single-Use Plastics' WHERE country = 'USA';
UPDATE plastic_pollution_data SET plastic_waste_kg = 5000.75, population = 1000000 WHERE country = 'USA' AND year = 2020;
UPDATE policy_recommendations SET recommendation = 'Implement stricter plastic waste management policies', importance_level = 5 WHERE country = 'Canada';
UPDATE plastic_pollution_data SET plastic_waste_kg = 5000 WHERE country = 'USA';
UPDATE policy_recommendations SET recommendation = 'Implement strict plastic waste management policies' WHERE importance_level >= 3;
UPDATE plastic_pollution_data SET pollution_level = 3.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE environmental_conservation SET conservation_impact = 'Significantly reduced plastic waste in oceans' WHERE conservation_id = 2;
UPDATE plastic_pollution_data SET pollution_level = 7.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE environmental_conservation SET conservation_strategy = 'Reduce plastic usage' WHERE conservation_id = 2;
UPDATE plastic_pollution_data SET pollution_rate = 3.5 WHERE country = 'USA' AND year = 2021;
UPDATE marine_life_impact SET impact_severity = 'High' WHERE species = 'Sea Turtle';
